long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Play more games on the top-left menu.

"Extreme Racing Car Offline" is an exhilarating and immersive browser extension designed to take your online racing game experience to the next level. This exciting extension offers adrenaline-pumping, high-speed car racing action, all while conveniently allowing you to enjoy it in an offline mode.

Key Features:

Offline Mode: "Extreme Racing Car Offline" lives up to its name by providing an electrifying racing experience without the need for an internet connection. This means you can enjoy fast-paced races wherever you are, even when you're offline or don't have a stable internet connection.

Sleek Graphics: Immerse yourself in stunning 3D graphics and realistic environments that will make you feel like you're right in the driver's seat of your high-performance racing car. Every detail is meticulously crafted to provide a visually captivating experience.

Wide Selection of Cars: Choose from a diverse and impressive lineup of high-end racing cars, each with its own unique attributes and handling characteristics. Whether you prefer the raw power of a muscle car or the precision of a sports car, there's a vehicle to suit your style.

Challenging Tracks: "Extreme Racing Car Offline" offers a variety of challenging tracks that test your racing skills to the limit. Navigate through hairpin turns, daring loops, and straightaways as you strive for victory.

Customization: Customize your racing car to your heart's content. Upgrade and fine-tune various aspects of your vehicle, from the engine and tires to the paint job and decals, to gain a competitive edge.

Compete Against AI: Race against highly intelligent AI opponents that provide a real challenge. The AI is designed to adapt to your skills, ensuring each race is an exciting and unpredictable experience.

Multiple Game Modes: Whether you're in the mood for a quick race or a more extended championship, "Extreme Racing Car Offline" offers a range of game modes to keep you engaged. Compete in time trials, championships, or head-to-head races.

Leaderboards: Keep track of your progress and compare your best lap times and race results with friends and other players on the global leaderboards. Strive to climb the ranks and become the ultimate racing champion.

User-Friendly Interface: The extension features a user-friendly interface that makes it easy to navigate and jump into the action, whether you're a casual gamer or a seasoned racing enthusiast.

"Extreme Racing Car Offline" is the perfect extension for those who crave heart-pounding racing thrills anytime, anywhere, and without the need for an internet connection. Whether you're looking for a quick gaming fix or a more immersive racing experience, this extension delivers it all in one offline package. Get ready to rev your engines and dominate the racetrack in this adrenaline-charged racing adventure.
